title: Powergold ver. 10.02.000
description:
Welcome to Powergold

Powergold music scheduling software is designed for the Microsoft Windows family of operating systems. This is an advanced, yet easy to use, software product designed for the needs of today's radio station program directors, music directors, and consultants.




Save Time - Save Money

Powergold was the world's first Windows music scheduler having been introduced in 1998. Now, based on over ten years of continuous development, Powergold's technological lead ensures an enjoyable computing experience with perfect schedules every time. 




With Powergold, unscheduled positions, a common, time consuming and expensive annoyance of older DOS music schedulers, are a thing of the past! Powergold provides an entire arsenal of time saving tools allowing you total creativity in music scheduling with no compromise.




Easy Sharing as Standard!

Get ready to share! Whether you're a single or multi channel station or group - or multi user state broadcaster, Powergold's unique song, clock, format, and schedule sharing options deliver new levels of flexibility and convenience for those wishing to share data between multiple users.




Multi-User Ready

Powergold is network ready. Multiple users can share a single database and create and edit schedules. Each user can change the way Powergold looks and 'feels' with their own personal settings stored in their unique profile. Permissions can be assigned to individual users and these permissions can be saved to a template making it simple to introduce new users or replace workstations. True multi-monitor support mode for Powergold means Windows will properly remember the monitor a Powergold screen last opened on and will return to that same window and position next time the screen is opened.




Multi Channel Protection

Powergold's Adaptive Interface (commonly referred to as A.I.) provides UNPRECEDENTED levels protection and control throughout your entire multi channel network. Powerful horizontal protection rules guarantee a different song on all your channels, all of the time!




Robust and Reliable

Major broadcasters of renown, worldwide, have made Powergold their tool of choice for robust and reliable music scheduling. Powergold is a single .exe program ensuring stability throughout your working day.




World Class Support

The support team looking after your needs are the best in the business. Powergold is more than just software. It's a professional suite of powerful scheduling tools backed 24/7 by our export support staff based across the world. Wherever you are, we'll be there to help you when you need us. And we'll always have the answer.
